area_name: F: The Herd and The Den

content.description: Sit start on an overhang and jugs through fun, bouldery moves to a very blank slab. Absolutely exhilarating feeling to stick that top hold. It’s a beautiful climb.
content.location: West of the main cluster of this area. Obvious to spot. Boulder sits on a large, flat slab.

content.description: Sit start on a low jug, move up and right through cool holds and unusual moves. Topping out the boulder is possible but not entirely recommended; there's an obvious stopping point on a ledge, and while the climb the rest of the way to the top isn't hard the downclimb is pretty tenuous.
content.location: Near the center of the area, under a large overhanging prow. Near 18 on the map of the area.

pathTokens: F: The Herd and The Den

content.description: A bunch of easy to moderate problems, many (but not all) of them highballs. Home to some of E-Rocks' proudest projects.
